project_plan.name: Random Password Generator in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a Python script that generates a random password including uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters, with a user-configurable length.

task.name: Implement the core functionality to generate random passwords based on user-defined length, including the characters required.
Ensure that the password contains at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character.
Implement user input functionality to allow the user to specify the desired length of the password.
Write tests to validate the password generation logic, ensuring compliance with requirements for character inclusion.
Execute tests to verify that the password generation works as expected.
